thread.title: BRIEF-Uber Says To Bring Uberair To Market, Co Plans To Partner With Three 'Launch Cities'

title: BRIEF-Uber Says To Bring Uberair To Market, Co Plans To Partner With Three 'Launch Cities'
text:
May 9, 2018 / 4:47 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Uber Says To Bring Uberair To Market, Co Plans To Partner With Three 'Launch Cities' Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) -
* UBER SAYS TO BRING UBERAIR TO MARKET, CO PLANS TO PARTNER WITH THREE ‘LAUNCH CITIES’
* UBER - PLANS TO OPERATE A NETWORK OF SMALL, 100 PERCENT ELECTRIC VERTICAL TAKE-OFF AND LANDING AIRCRAFT IN CITIES AROUND THE WORLD
* UBER SAYS DALLAS AND LOS ANGELES WERE PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED AS THE FIRST TWO LAUNCH CITIES, AND CO IS NOW SEEKING AN INTERNATIONAL CITY AS THE THIRD PARTNER
* UBER - STARTING IN 2023, UBER CUSTOMERS WILL BE ABLE TO PUSH A BUTTON AND GET A FLIGHT ON DEMAND
* UBER- ANNOUNCES AN OPEN CALL TO SELECT THE FIRST INTERNATIONAL CITY TO LAUNCH UBERAIR Further company coverage:
